description: This product is great for any teen, it is easy to set up and connect to the phone. The text is big and readable, the screen is bright and the battery lasts a long time. The notification options are good, it tells you when you have a reply and the sleep tracking feature is accurate.
Use_cases:
The top 3 use cases of the product are: 
1. Checking BP monitor 
2. Notifies of replies 
3. Tells battery quality
phrases:
This product is:
-Good for teens
-Able to sync with phone
-Has a bright screen
-Has a speaker
-Tells time accurately
